{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Phicomm K2P.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Phicomm |model = K2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = P |revision = (B1) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YJYK2PB |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 800002354 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47189B0;BCM47189B0KRFBG; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 900 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q127CSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W631GG6KB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125S;BCM53125SKMMLG; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D8:C8:E9 |oui = D8:C8:E9
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pad header,, J1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier;Richwave;RTC5641EX;067, 41EX, 1721;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo;QPF4519;Q, QPF4519, 5DVB;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = PHICOMM_XX, PHICOMM_XX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "800002354" and "V1.5" is silkscreened on the [http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/SAM_2597.jpg main board].
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM47189 @900MHz WiSoC (ARM Cortex-A7) *Wireless Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 (2T2R 802.11bgn) *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 300Mbps for 2.4GHz, 867Mbps for 5GHz
===Hardware Version=== *K2P (A1) • CPU: MT7621A @880MHz (Dual Core MIPS 1004Kc) *K2P (A2) • CPU: MT7621A @880MHz (Dual Core MIPS 1004Kc) *K2P (B1) • CPU: BCM47189 @900MHz (Single Core ARM CA7) *K2P (B2) • CPU: BCM47189 @900MHz (Single Core ARM CA7)
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.acwifi.net/3238.html ''Phicomm K2P B1'' on '''AC|WiFi.net'''] ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/all-1080x720.jpg PCB image]) *[http://www.acwifi.net/3261.html ''Phicomm K2P A1/B1'' on '''AC|WiFi.net'''] ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/k2P-and-k2P-BCM-1.jpg PCB image]) *[http://www.acwifi.net/2131.html ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''AC|WiFi.net'''] ([http://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/k2p-chipe.jpg PCB image]) *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-107892-1-1.html ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] ([http://koolshare.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=107892&aid=159621&from=album&page=1 PCB images]) *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/when-does-the-lede-support-the-phicomm-k2p/4889 ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''LEDE''' forums] ([http://lists.infradead.org/pipermail/lede-commits/2017-July/004365.html LEDE support]) *[http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-216935-1-1.html ''Phicomm K2P A1'' on '''right.com''' forums]
==See also== *[[Phicomm K3]] - AC3150 Smart Wi-Fi Router (2167+1000Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/121.html PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709 @1.4GHz (Cortex A9), RAM: 512MB :3.5" TFT LCD Display, "800002240" V1.0 PCB (4T4R PA/LNA) *[[Phicomm K3C A1|Phicomm K3C]] - AC1900 Smart Wi-Fi Router (1300+600Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/124.html PPage] :CPU: [[Lantiq (Intel)]] PXB4395EL @1.6GHz (GRX350), RAM: 256MB *[[Phicomm K2]] ([http://www.acwifi.net/5420.html PSG1218]) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/65.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2C]] (PSG1218) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/73.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2G]] ([http://www.acwifi.net/5420.html PSG1218]) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/65.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2P]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz, RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 64MB *[[Phicomm K2T]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • *[[Phicomm KE 2P]] - AC1300 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+400Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/123.html PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz, RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 16MB *[[Phicomm K1]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/66.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K1S]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/68.html PPage]
